name: Drupal Docker Initiative
body:
### Welcome to Drupal Docker Initiative.
We are here to bring Docker awesomeness to your life. Use one of our Drupal-tailored images to build lightweight, shippable environment for your app. Use it on all stages of development - your local machine, test, staging or production environment.

### Find us
[Docker Hub](https://hub.docker.com/r/drupaldocker/)

[Github](https://github.com/drupal-docker)

### Missing image? Feature request!
Do not hesitate to create [feature request issue](https://github.com/drupal-docker/drupal-docker.github.io/issues).

### Contributing
Just fork one of our repos, do some changes and create Pull Request. Each Pull Request has to pass build test (on Travis).


***

More info coming soon, stay tuned!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
